metadata.title: Purefair Colorful Dream Catcher Duvet Cover Set King, Boho Bohemian Style 3D Feathers Diamond Bedding Mandala Native American Indian Ethnic Tribal 3PCS Luxury Soft Quilt Cover Set(No Comforter)
features: PREMIUM MATERIAL: Our bedding set is made from 130gsm microfiber, which make the duvet cover more thick,soft and durable. The burshed microfiber fabric is smooth to touch, breathable and skin-friendly. Reactive printing and dyeing printing process to make the color still bright after every wash.

SET: King Size includes 1 King Duvet Cover: 104" x 90" , 2 Standard Pillowcases: 20" x 36"(NO COMFORTER). Every duvet cover has a zipper closure to get your duvet in and out; corner ties to keep your duvet insert in place.

DESIGN: This boho ethnic style duvet cover set is printing by reactive dyeing, vibrant in color and no fade issue. Perfect for bedroom, guest room, kids room, vacation home, and a great gift to your loved Children, Little Baby, Kids, Boys, Girls, Teen, Friends, Lovers and Family.
EASY CARE: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. No fade, No stain and No shrink. Tumble dry at low temperature, do not bleach.

GUARANTEE FOR YOU: Purefair provides 30 days return and replacement service & life-time free customer service - If you have any questions during the purchase, please feel free to contact us and we will reply you within a short time.
description: Express Your Individuality with Bohemian Decorating

The dense fabric is made from 100% brushed microfiber which is surprisingly soft and lightweight. Reactive printing and dyeing technology has the advantage of durable, non-fading. All suture lines in the duvet cover are hidden inside, overall nice. With hidden zipper closure in, easy to separate and launder. Fasten duvet with ribbon inside to keep duvet in place. It's a great gift idea for women friends, family, girls, Moms, Valentine's - Mother's - Day, wedding, birthday and Christmas.
Corner ties, to keep your duvet insert in place;
Zipper closure, convenient to get the duvet in and out.
Twin Size - duvet cover 68" x 90", pillow case 20" x 26"
Queen Size - duvet cover 90" x 90", pillow cases 20" x 26"
King Size - duvet cover 104" x 90", pillow cases 20" x 36"
Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle, tumble dry low, do not bleach.
We provide 100% satisfaction with 30 night trial, return for full refund if you don't entirely love.
*Please note: The comforter or duvet insert is not included.

title: Comforter Cover Soft Bedding Sets 3 Piece
